mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: ADAHealth was founded with a simple mission: protect delegators by providing transparency about retired stake pools.
mission.paragraph2: When pools retire, many wallets remain unknowingly delegated, resulting in millions of ADA in lost rewards.
mission.paragraph3: We believe every delegator should have access to accurate, up-to-date information about their pool's status.
